entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 30%
